name: lovers
description:
explore a tomb whichever way you like. it's okay, it's a tomb. she was prepared for any sort of visitor, or she wouldn't have died.

this is more of an interactive illustration than a game. i just needed to get these images out of my head, and also to understand the mechanics of drag sprites.

sounds used: 
night sounds, ten minutes

just like a tree - au revoir simone

this is my hand - my brigtest diamond
